name: api_v1_fastings
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sunnah_fasting.
Tool description: List of sunnah fasting schedule. Start from year 2022.
API description: Fetches a list of sunnah fastings based on provided filters.

day.description: Day of the month to filter the fastings.

category_id.description: Category ID to filter the fastings.

type_id.description: Type ID to filter the fastings.
